description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Y4ajp13ACVnzaS5s]{Drone Chassis}

Compact and resilient, the stormscout drone was developed on Shimrinsara to survive deadly weather and even direct lightning strikes—defenses that make them popular across the galaxy for entering dangerous areas, collecting samples for scientific examination, and recording their surroundings.

Initial Mods

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.uf8ByNvudMSltp51]{Camera (Ex)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.fYe0a1Wts1w7RXe1]{Conductive Plating (Ex)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.A8EizEg8WZh7t2wq]{Manipulator Arms (Ex)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.wJcZkzm1cs8aZhPc]{Resistance (Ex)}
